name: Office Desk Chair with Ergonomic Lumbar Support, Extra-Thick Seat Cushion, Flip-up Arms, Breathable Mesh Back, Computer Task Chair for Home Office
short_description: 【𝐀𝐧 𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐨𝐧𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐜 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲 𝐡𝐚𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤】The lumbar support actually moves up, down, in, and out—so no matter your height, your lower back isn’t left hanging anymore. 𝐇𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: 𝟏.𝟖", 𝐃𝐞𝐩𝐭𝐡 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: 𝟏.𝟎𝟔".

【𝐀𝐥𝐥-𝐃𝐚𝐲 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐢𝐩𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐬】The 𝟑.𝟓𝟒" (𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐞𝐫 𝟏" 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝐮𝐬𝐮𝐚𝐥) cushion is noticeably plumper than the usual flimsy seats. You’ll feel the difference when you sit in CASASIO office chair—soft, supportive, and it doesn’t sink.
【𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐩 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐬𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞】cramming your chair under a desk? Flip the arms up and tuck it neatly away. Small apartment, shared dorm, cluttered office—it finally fits your life.

【𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐲𝐨𝐮】Smooth seat height adjustment keeps your posture right for work, study, or gaming. 𝐍𝐎𝐓𝐄: Need a shorter or taller cylinder? We’ve got you covered—just reach out to CASASIO team via the warranty card.

【𝐋𝐨𝐨𝐤𝐬 𝐚𝐬 𝐠𝐨𝐨𝐝 𝐚𝐬 𝐢𝐭 𝐟𝐞𝐞𝐥𝐬】Forget bulky, boring desk chairs. The hourglass shape isn’t just stylish—it mirrors your spine’s natural curve. The 𝐛𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 mesh keeps air flowing. Even after hours in the task chair, you won’t stick to it like with leather.
【𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐭 𝐬𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐝—𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐞𝐝 𝐮𝐩】𝐁𝐈𝐅𝐌𝐀&𝐒𝐆𝐒 𝐏𝐀𝐒𝐒𝐄𝐃. It passed the serious durability tests. Hold up to 𝟑3𝟎𝐋𝐁𝐒.

【𝐒𝐦𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐡 𝐓𝐢𝐥𝐭 & 𝐑𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐍𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐥 𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐚𝐱𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】The chair’s tilt-and-rock mechanism moves naturally with your body, reducing back tension and promoting healthy circulation. Adjustable tension lets you personalize the rocking experience for all-day comfort.

【𝐓𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐇𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐥𝐞-𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐥𝐲】Clear instructions and included tools make assembly quick and easy. Our responsive customer service team is ready to assist, ensuring peace of mind for your purchase.
